question: Who can use iCaller app?
answer: Anyone who install iCaller app properly.

question: How to install and configure to use all functions of iCaller?
answer:
• After installing and starting app > Accept app for accessing your phone book.
• To show device phone book, go to Settings section > scroll down and choose iCaller app > turn on the permission for accessing phone book.
• You turn on function Display pop-up window & Display pop-up windows while running in the background to show ID of incoming call.

question: Why does not my app's screen display caller’s name?
answer: To display caller’s name on incoming call, user have to turn Display pop-up window & Display pop-up windows while running in the background on your phone.

question: Which operating systems are supported by iCaller app?
answer: iCaller app is compatible with devices using the operating system Android 6.0 and above and 10.0 or higher for IOS devices.

question: What are the advantages of using iCaller service?
answer: iCaller provides a fully functional phone feature. Calls,Anti-Spam, all in one app to manage your calls.

question: Where can I download iCaller app?
answer: You can download the iCaller app from the Google Play app store or Apple Store.

question: Why does not iCaller app display my phone book?
answer:
To display phone book to app, you need to allow iCaller app to access your phone book according to the instructions:
• For iPhone, go to Settings section > scroll down and choose iCaller app > turn on the permission for accessing phone book.
• For Android phones: go to settings section > select application management > choose iCaller app > turn on the permission for accessing phone book.

question: I use 2 sims, how can I choose the right sim of iCaller?
answer:
There are 2 ways (choosing sim using iCaller is the default sim)
• Settings > mobile data > default voice line > select iCaller sim
• Open the iphone call > press the number to call > select iCaller sim to make a call.

question: Do I have internet connection to use this app?
answer: NO. user still can use service without internet access. However, icaller need internet connection to update spam list.
